title: Architectural conservation of archs in the Mosque of al-Sultan Barquq at the Northern cemetery
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Mosquée Barkouk au désert - Sahn côté Est.  Translation of photographer's description: Barkouk Mosque in the desert Sahn East Side - Collector's note: 29) Barkouk (mosq.fun.) Sahn: coin sud-est (av.trav.) Translation of collector's note: 29) Barkouk (mosque mausoleum) Sahn: South-East corner (before construction work). Convent and mausoleum of Sultan Farag.
location: Al-Qarafa al-Kubra; Al-Qāhirah governorate; Egypt; Africa
architectural-detail: arches; architectural conservation; domes; doors; sahns
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Architectural conservation of archs in the Mosque of al-Sultan Barquq at the Northern cemetery
